entities.description: How important the things learned in school over the past 12 months are going to be for the respondent's future life.
How interesting the respondent finds their courses at school during the past 12 months.
Frequency with which teachers let the respondent know when they were doing a good job in school over the past 12 months.
Grades the respondent received for the last semester or grading period they completed.

relationships.description: Indicates how important the respondent believes the things learned in school over the past 12 months are for their future.
Indicates the level of interest the respondent has in their courses over the past 12 months.
Indicates the frequency with which the respondent's teachers provided feedback on their performance over the past 12 months.
Indicates the grades the respondent received for the last semester or grading period they completed.
